    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ApolloDecorator​(Phase decoratedPhase, boolean bActAsOpponentGod)
    Constructor : sets the phase the decorator is decorating and a boolean that if it is set as true tells that the decorator acts when it is played by an opponent of the god card's owner

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void evalCandidateCells()
    Method called by a decorated turn's movePhase, it adds cells to a list of candidate cells according to this god's power It adds the standard candidate cells and also the neighbouring cells occupied by opponent's workers
    void performActionOnCell​(Cell chosenCell)
    This method performs the action described by the god's power on the cell chosen by the player

  • Constructor Details

    • ApolloDecorator

      public ApolloDecorator​(Phase decoratedPhase, boolean bActAsOpponentGod)
      Constructor : sets the phase the decorator is decorating and a boolean that if it is set as true tells that the decorator acts when it is played by an opponent of the god card's owner
      Parameters:
      decoratedPhase - phase the decorator is going to decorate
      bActAsOpponentGod - true if the god card will act only when it is being played as an opponent god card, otherwise it is false

  • Method Details

    • evalCandidateCells

      public void evalCandidateCells()
      Method called by a decorated turn's movePhase, it adds cells to a list of candidate cells according to this god's power It adds the standard candidate cells and also the neighbouring cells occupied by opponent's workers

      public void performActionOnCell​(Cell chosenCell)

      Overrides:
      performActionOnCell in class GodPowerDecorator
      Parameters:
      chosenCell - the Cell the worker wants to move to
